message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with straight-line drawings of planar graphs, which is a topic in computational geometry (cs.CG). The concept of area-universality is related to graph theory and combinatorics (cs.DM), and the paper presents a criterion for area-universality that involves investigating one area assignment, which is a computational problem (cs.GT). The paper also uses developed machinery to present area-universal families of triangulations, which involves data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and the characterization of area-universality of accordion graphs may involve machine learning or pattern recognition techniques (cs.SI).
